title: "Projects"

A selection of data analytics projects showcasing statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and business insights.

## Featured Projects

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [Project 1: Fundraising Strategies](/projects/project1/)
**Statistical Analysis of Donation Effectiveness**

Evaluated the effectiveness of matching grants on donation amounts and rates using t-tests and regression analysis. Found that matching grant treatments had a statistically significant positive effect on donations.

**Methods:** T-tests, Linear Regression, Statistical Testing  
**Data:** Charitable donation records with demographic variables

[View Project →](/projects/project1/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [Project 2: Patent Analysis](/projects/project2/)
**Predictive Modeling of Patent Holdings**

Explored the relationship between age, region, and customer status on patent holdings using Poisson regression. Built models to predict patent counts based on multiple factors.

**Methods:** Poisson Regression, EDA, Distribution Analysis  
**Data:** Patent and customer status data

[View Project →](/projects/project2/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [Project 3: Conjoint Analysis](/projects/project3/)
**Consumer Preference Analysis**

Analyzed consumer preferences through conjoint analysis to identify key drivers of product choice and willingness to pay across different yogurt product attributes.

**Methods:** Conjoint Analysis, Preference Modeling  
**Data:** Consumer choice experiments

[View Project →](/projects/project3/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [Project 4: Drivers Analysis](/projects/project4/)
**Key Driver Regression**

Identified the primary factors driving business outcomes through key driver analysis, isolating which variables have the strongest impact on performance metrics.

**Methods:** Key Driver Analysis, Regression Modeling  
**Data:** Business performance metrics

[View Project →](/projects/project4/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [Project 5: Data Exploration](/projects/Project5/)
**Multi-Dataset Exploratory Analysis**

Comprehensive exploratory data analysis comparing patterns across multiple datasets including iris and penguin measurements. Identified key statistical patterns and relationships.

**Methods:** EDA, Distribution Analysis, Statistical Summaries  
**Data:** Iris, Palmer Penguins, Yogurt datasets

[View Project →](/projects/Project5/)
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [Project 6: Qualcomm Capstone Analysis](/projects/project6/)
**Strategic Business Analysis & Optimization**

In-depth analysis of Qualcomm's business operations, competitive positioning, and strategic opportunities. Integrated financial data, market trends, and operational metrics to identify key performance drivers and recommend actionable strategies.

**Methods:** Strategic Analysis, Financial Modeling, Comparative Benchmarking  
**Deliverables:** Detailed report and executive presentation

[View Project →](/projects/project6/)
:::

:::
